answers.answer: Im 29 weeks and I'll be taking mine Friday i think 20 weeks is early to take it :)
So i just read your 35 weeks duh lol i don't think your doctor would have you do it if it wasn't worth it
I just did mine last week.. Just do it to get it out of the way  :-) plus it'll give you peace of mind
I'm talking mine in third trimester..It won't hurt to do it

I'll be taking it August 1st when i'm 29 weeks. It's not necessary to take it, it's just to see if you have diabetes, since that can cause harm to the baby, and you. I'll be doing it since diabetes runs in my family. It never hurts to see if you're in the safe!
I took mine at 33weeks bcuz i moved different city. My dr didnt seem to worried about it. Ill see what the test results are when i go back at 36weeks....so still another two weeks to wait
My sister is 36 weeks and she was suppose to do hers last week and she isn't going to do hers until next week cus her doctor forgot to tell her to go to the lab to get it done

question: Im 35 weeks today and have my lab appt for the diabetes testing on thursday. I was suppose to go when i was in my 20s (weeks). But lost my lab slip and asked for a new one but after literally every apt im sent over tk do blood work because my blood pressure is always high so i didnt get the slip till last week. My question is has anyone else taken it this late? How necessary is the test.
title: glucose testing
